content.rendered:
Harry Potter Week

From July 25-29, you can enter for a chance to win prizes including a NEW Harry Potter book set! To enter, bring a broom to any of our store locations. One entry per day, per location.

Board Book Deal

Don’t miss out on our board book deal! Buy two board books and get a FREE onesie. These popular titles and cute onesies make for great baby shower gifts.

Audiobook Weekend

Like to listen to books while driving? Wrap up the summer with some audiobooks from Gottwals Books. From August 5-6, choose a FREE audiobook ($7.97-$11.97 value) with any $10 purchase.

excerpt.rendered: From July 25-29, you can enter for a chance to win prizes including a NEW Harry Potter book set! To enter, bring a broom to any of our store locations. One entry per day, per location.
